thread.title: NTN Buzztime, Inc. to Discuss Third-Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015
thread.title_full: NTN Buzztime, Inc. to Discuss Third-Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NTN Buzztime, Inc. to Discuss Third-Quarter 2015 Financial Results on November 5, 2015
text:
NTN Buzztime, Inc.
CARLSBAD, Calif. , Oct. 22, NTN Buzztime, Inc. (NYSE MKT: NTN), announced it will conduct a conference call to discuss its financial results for the third-quarter ended September 30, 2015 at 4:30 P.M. ET on Thursday, November 5, 2015 .
Hosting the call will be CEO Ram Krishnan and CFO Allen Wolff . The call will include discussion of investor questions submitted by email to buzztimeinvestor@buzztime.com . Questions from investors should be submitted as far in advance as possible for inclusion in the discussion.
To access the conference call, please dial (877) 307-1373, if calling from the United States or Canada , or (678) 224-7873, if calling internationally, and use passcode 66915871.
A replay of the call will be available until November 12, 2015 , which can be accessed by dialing (855) 859-2056, if calling from the United States or Canada , or (404) 537-3406, if calling internationally. Please use passcode 66915871 to access the replay.
The call will also be accompanied live by webcast over the Internet and accessible at the Company's Web site at http://www.buzztime.com .
IR AGENCY CONTACT:
Becky Herrick / Kirsten Chapman , LHA
buzztime@lhai.com
415-433-3777
